edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.cache

Interface Cache


  • public interface Cache
    Interface to be implemented by all caches. Instances will be shared Singletons, so must be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flush()
      Deletes the entire cache contents.
      void flush(Parameters params)
      Deletes the cached image and dimensions corresponding to the given parameters.
      void flushExpired()
      Deletes expired images and dimensions from the cache.
      java.awt.Dimension getDimension(Identifier identifier)
      Reads cached dimension information.
      java.io.InputStream getImageInputStream(Parameters params)
      Returns an InputStream corresponding to the given parameters.
      java.io.OutputStream getImageOutputStream(Parameters params) 
      void putDimension(Identifier identifier, java.awt.Dimension size)
      Adds an image's dimension information to the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • flush

        void flush()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes the entire cache contents.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • flush

        void flush(Parameters params)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes the cached image and dimensions corresponding to the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        params -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • flushExpired

        void flushExpired()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes expired images and dimensions from the cache.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getImageInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getImageInputStream(Parameters params)

        Returns an InputStream corresponding to the given parameters.

        If an image corresponding to the given parameters exists in the cache but is expired, implementations should delete it.

        Parameters:
        params - IIIF request parameters
        Returns:
        An input stream corresponding to the given parameters, or null if a non-expired image corresponding to the given parameters does not exist in the cache.

      • getDimension

        java.awt.Dimension getDimension(Identifier identifier)
                         throws java.io.IOException

        Reads cached dimension information.

        If a dimension corresponding to the given parameters exists in the cache but is expired, implementations should delete it.

        Parameters:
        identifier - IIIF identifier
        Returns:
        Dimension corresponding to the given identifier, or null if no non-expired dimension exists in the cache.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getImageOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream getImageOutputStream(Parameters params)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        params - IIIF request parameters
        Returns:
        OutputStream to which an image corresponding to the supplied parameters can be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • putDimension

        void putDimension(Identifier identifier,
                  java.awt.Dimension size)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Adds an image's dimension information to the cache.
        Parameters:
        identifier - IIIF identifier
        size - Dimension containing width and height in pixels.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
